title: Correction: Single amino-acid mutation in a Drosoph ila melanogaster ribosomal protein: An insight in uL11 transcriptional activity
content: by Héloïse Grunchec, Jérôme Deraze, Delphine Dardalhon-Cuménal, Valérie Ribeiro, Anne Coléno-Costes, Karine Dias, Sébastien Bloyer, Emmanuèle Mouchel-Vielh, Frédérique Peronnet, Hélène Thomassin
author: Héloïse Grunchec
